I reasoned out a way around the bug I found in Visual Basic by 
counting the number of bytes instead of relying on Visual Basic's 
function.  That is going to be a fun process but I will be worth worth 
it when I get the computer program to allow me to text edit scenario 
401 (4000+ objects) fairly quickly.
